TopicTitle: Creating spoilers/ using images on Imgur

Articles.Content: After searching, I didn't find anything related to the topic of creating a spoiler and posting images off of Imgur inside of those spoilers, I just decided to create this thread. Forgive me if I am missing something very obvious, as I happen to do that a lot. To whoever can help me with this, I owe you a thanks.

[spoiler="something like this?"][img​]http://i.imgur.com/TNYw7.jpg

The img tag above won't work if copy and pasted by the way, I had to add an invisible space to get the code to display alongside the result as this forum doesn't support the usual copy and paste friendly way of faking it.

Edited August 22, 2012 by EndlessWaves
Alright thanks, I had a terrible time trying to figure it out
